description: OpenClassrooms is the leading online-only higher education institution in Europe offering top quality, education-to-employment programs, and career coaching services for students worldwide.
I was one of the 40 applicants who achieved a full scholarship on Front-end Development degree at OpenClassrooms by Facebook among thousands of applicants.
The degree is built around real-life professional-level projects which needed to be solved using modern technologies and following coding best practices.
Implemented an authentication system using JWT which includes access and refresh token to make the site more secure.

A mentor with experience of 10+ years in Software engineering was assigned to me who offered me one-to-one weekly video conference sessions for 12 months. All derivable are reviewed by independent third party who is also an expert in the field.
Built a network that can classify images of dogs and cats with state-of-the-art performance.
Learned how to use convolutional networks to build computer vision models.
Used a deep neural network to transfer the artistic style of one image onto another image.
Built a network that can generate realistic text one letter at a time.
Built a recurrent neural network that can accurately predict the sentiment of movie reviews.
Deployed PyTorch models with Torch Script.
Built a classifier that could identify different species of flowers from a pre-trained data set.
